overview: Sahasram movie tells a murder mystery that has been set in the cinema world. During the shooting of a film, its hero gets killed in suspicious circumstances. As he is also the son of a ruling minister, stories start to spread regarding the death. Now, Sahasranaman I.P.S is given the charge of the investigation, to unfold the murder mystery. Suresh Gopi play an IPS officer in this film.
title: Sahasram
